titleStmt.title: Anti-sozzo, sive, Sherlocismus enervatus in vindication of some great truths opposed, and opposition to some great errors maintained by Mr. William Sherlock.
titleStmt.author: Alsop, Vincent, 1629 or 30-1703.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Alsop by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
In answer to Sherlock's A discourse concerning the knowledge of Jesus Christ, and our union and communion with Him.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
